EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Blast - Boston_Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited - Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you tasked with deploying a successful analytics strategy in your organization? Would you like to avoid common issues that lead to delays and setbacks? At the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow (PAIR), you will spend the day with our data team learning how to jumpstart your analytics deployments and put your organization’s data to work. All sessions are complimentary. Morning Strategy Session For business and data professionals who want to better understand how to evolve their data and analytics capabilities to meet their business strategies and objectives.
Afternoon Workshop A hands-on workshop for technical practitioners. You’ll learn best practices for analytics in a guided exercise with a Pivotal data science expert. This session is limited to the first 20 registrants. Participants should bring their own laptops.
To view the detailed agenda, please visit the registration page <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/boston]]>.
Date: Tuesday 9 May 2017
Time:
8:00am - 1:15pm Strategy Session 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop for practitioners only (Limited seating)
Location: Pivotal Boston Office 255 Main St, Cambridge, MA 02142 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/255+Main+St,+Cambridge,+MA+02142/@42.3626831,-71.087541,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89e370a5f4efd825:0xc0c5b9cf0dd14f59!8m2!3d42.3626831!4d-71.0853523?hl=en]]>)
Register <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/boston]]>
If you have any questions, please email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
